title: Fusing AI with Proven CS Methods
description: AI Agent: Combines classical computer science methods with LLMs to deeply analyze the entire application: from code to cloud. Creating a rich and structured application representation for AI consumption.

title: Application Mocks Tailored for Agentic AI
description: Advanced application mocks are generated for each issue that the LogicStar agent reviews, capturing all relevant application components to ensure accurate reproduction of the problem.

title: AI-Powered Mock Execution Environment for Bug Reproduction
description: The AI Mock Execution Environment is designed to autonomously reproduce application bugs and generate failing tests, ensuring every issue is accurately captured and ready for resolution.

title: Evaluate and Verify AI Fix Suggestions at Scale
description: In this final step, our agent systematically evaluates AI-generated fix suggestions, leveraging structured context about the application, problem, and reproduction steps. The result: one or more verified fixes, ready for seamless manual code review and deployment.
